posts.post_content:
Played this in a RWU wall deck during a tribal tournament. Add in [Furnace of Rath](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Furnace of Rath) + [Incite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Incite) + [Fling](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fling). Incite forces the creature of choice to attack, cast the Glyph on a wall and block. Fling blocking wall, doubles through the furnace for at least 20 damage.
  
   
HAHA I just threw a wall at your head for the win!!!

posts.post_content:
The best of the glyphs, for what that's worth. +10/+0 for one mana is too much to completely ignore even with all the restrictions -- I recall spending a while trying to figure out a use for this.  
  
Unfortunately, it still basically sucks; it's not worth the effort to use it, and you'd be better off with [Righteousness](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Righteousness) anyway.

posts.post_content: Great fun can be had with this card in a G/W/R deck. Give [Meglonoth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Meglonoth) and hit him with [Shields of Velis Vel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shields of Velis Vel) and [Incite War](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Incite War). Give him the Glyph then Fling him and you're all good. Lots of little ways to do this, even ways to force everyone to attack and to allow him to block any number of creatures.
